si.title: 2024 ජනාධිපතිවරණය: නාමයෝජනා ආරම්භ වේ
body_lines: 2024 ජනාධිපතිවරණය සඳහා නාමයෝජනා භාර ගැනීමේ ක්රියාවලිය මැතිවරණ කොමිසම ආරම්භ කර තිබේ.

en.title: 2024 presidential election: nominations begin
body_lines: The Election Commission has begun the process of accepting nominations for the 2024 presidential election.

summary_lines: Nominations for the 2024 presidential election have started, as announced by the Election Commission.
